title: Sri Lanka population is 20,277,597 – reveals Census Report 2012
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Nalin Hewapathirana) Sri Lanka’s latest population is 20,277,597 as of 20 March 2012 revealed within the preliminary report issued by the Department of Census and Statistics. The preliminary publication related to the 14th Population and Housing Census handed over to President Mahinda Rajapaksa by Superintendent of Census…
